typeGreetings.screening: I'll be conducting your initial screening today.
typeGreetings.technical: I'll be conducting your technical assessment today.
typeGreetings.behavioral: I'll be conducting your behavioral interview today.
typeGreetings.final: I'll be conducting your final interview today.

difficultyGuidance.entry: Focus on foundational concepts and basic understanding.
difficultyGuidance.mid: Ask moderately challenging questions appropriate for someone with a few years of experience.
difficultyGuidance.senior: Ask in-depth questions that probe advanced expertise and leadership experience.
difficultyGuidance.executive: Focus on strategic thinking, vision, leadership philosophy, and business impact.

screening.name: Introduction & Background
questions: Ask the candidate for a brief introduction (30-60 seconds)
Why are they looking for a new opportunity right now?
What attracted them to this position?

screening.name: Work Authorization & Logistics
questions: Current location and willingness to relocate (if job requires it)
Visa/work authorization status and sponsorship needs
Notice period or availability to start

screening.name: Basic Qualifications
questions: Confirm years of experience in relevant field
Verify key skills mentioned in the job description
Ask about salary expectations (if appropriate)

screening.name: Availability & Interest Level
questions: Their timeline for making a decision
Are they interviewing elsewhere?
Any questions about the role or company?

technical.name: Core Technical Knowledge
questions: Ask questions specific to the technologies in the job description
Probe understanding of fundamental concepts
Request examples from past projects demonstrating these skills

technical.name: Problem-Solving Approach
questions: Present a relevant technical scenario or challenge
Ask them to walk through their approach to solving it
Understand their thought process and decision-making

technical.name: Hands-On Experience
questions: Discuss specific projects they've worked on
Ask about challenges faced and how they overcame them
Explore their role and contributions to team projects

technical.name: Best Practices & Tools
questions: Their familiarity with industry best practices
Tools and frameworks they're comfortable with
How they stay updated with technology trends

behavioral.name: Teamwork & Collaboration
questions: Describe a time they worked on a challenging team project
How do they handle conflicts with team members?
Example of helping a struggling colleague

behavioral.name: Problem-Solving & Initiative
questions: Tell me about a complex problem they solved
A time they went above and beyond their role
How they handle ambiguity or unclear requirements

behavioral.name: Leadership & Influence
questions: Example of leading a project or initiative (formal or informal)
How they've mentored others or shared knowledge
A time they had to persuade others to their viewpoint

behavioral.name: Growth & Learning
questions: Biggest professional failure and lessons learned
How they handle feedback and criticism
Recent skill or technology they learned and why

final.name: Motivation & Career Goals
questions: What are their long-term career aspirations?
How does this role fit into their career trajectory?
What motivates them professionally?

final.name: Company & Culture Fit
questions: What do they know about our company?
What excites them most about potentially joining?
Questions about our values, mission, or products

final.name: Role Clarity & Expectations
questions: Their understanding of the role and responsibilities
What success looks like to them in the first 90 days
Any concerns or questions about the position?

final.name: Logistics & Next Steps
questions: Confirm compensation expectations
Start date availability
Any pending offers or interviews to be aware of?
